statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{18 \, x^{3} + 12 \, x^{2} - x - 9 , -3 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x , -3 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x + 3 , -6 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 1 , -6 \, x^{3} + x^{2} + 2 \, x - 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
